author: bencomic

right.text: I saw a chick yesterday. She had a rack you could mount a server in.
Steve Irwin's favourate TV show as a kid was Captain Scarlet, but he'll allways have a place in his heart for Stingray.
Terri Irwin is suing a major sunblock company for failing to live up to it's promise and protect against harmfull rays.

title: #mzx comedy club: Scorch, with opening act by echeese
